channel.title: Cryptocurrency on TB Pro Invest
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptocurrency on TB Pro Invest

item.title: Trump supports cryptocurrencies
item.description: It’s no small matter that a former, and very possibly future, American president, Donald Trump, publicly speaks out in support of cryptocurrencies.

item.title: BTC - record price of over $72,500
item.description: Bitcoin has reached a new record level of over $72,500, and one of the reasons is that the financial regulator in the United Kingdom has stated that it will allow trading of securities backed by cryptocurrencies.

item.title: BlackRock already owns 196,065 Bitcoins, more than MicroStrategy
item.description: BlackRock’s ETF already owns over 196,000 BTC, surpassing MicroStrategy, which has collected 193,000 pieces so far but over a much longer period.

item.title: South Korea and Bitcoin ETF?
item.description: The government of the Republic of Korea is considering the possibility of introducing spot ETFs in their country.

item.title: Coinbase stock surged by over 60% in February
item.description: The second-largest crypto exchange, Coinbase, is experiencing a surge and explosion in demand for their shares.

item.title: New ATH on BITCOIN, unprepared banks in fear
item.description: Strong growth of BTC in this 2024 year are record investments of the most powerful players in the global capital markets.

item.title: Purchased 3,000 BTC, and achieved a profit of over 70%
item.description: MicroStrategy has purchased an additional 3,000 BTC, and it seems that Michael Saylor has fulfilled his promise when he recently said he plans to buy BTC indefinitely.

item.title: On Coinbase, we have the lowest level of Bitcoin since 2015.
item.description: One of the reasons for the rise in the price of Bitcoin (BTC) along with increased interest and the entry of ETF funds is this.

item.title: New rise in BTC price in 2024
item.description: The price has exceeded $53,000, which is the highest price in the past year and a growth of over 250%.

item.title: Analyst expectations for btc price are modest
item.description: The halving is approaching, and analysts predict that the price could reach $70,000.

item.title: Chainlink (LINK) unlocks tokens worth 340 million USD
item.description: This cryptocurrency, which aims to incentivize a global network of computers by providing reliable information from around the world via smart contracts on the blockchain, recently unlocked over 19 million LINK tokens - equivalent to over $340 million.

item.title: AVAX - Avalanche Prepares to Release 9.5 Million Tokens
item.description: The blockchain platform is preparing for significant development in February. The expected release of various projects is valued at around $900 million.

item.title: Binance fine of 4,2 billon
item.description: Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, will pay the largest fine in history.

item.title: Kripto ETF
item.description: The United States is the largest home to over 3000 ETF funds according to 2023 data.
